description: Adds the specified SSL server certificate to the certificate list for the specified HTTPS or TLS listener. If the certificate in already in the certificate list, the call is successful but the certificate is not added again. For more information, see HTTPS listeners in the Application Load Balancers Guide or TLS listeners in the Network Load Balancers Guide.

parameters.name: ListenerArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener.

parameters.name: Certificates
parameters.description: The certificate to add. You can specify one certificate per call. Set CertificateArn to the certificate ARN but do not set IsDefault. (dict) --- Information about an SSL server certificate. CertificateArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate. IsDefault (boolean) --- Indicates whether the certificate is the default certificate. Do not set this value when specifying a certificate as an input. This value is not included in the output when describing a listener, but is included when describing listener certificates.

nested_params.name: CertificateArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate.

nested_params.name: IsDefault
nested_params.description: Indicates whether the certificate is the default certificate. Do not set this value when specifying a certificate as an input. This value is not included in the output when describing a listener, but is included when describing listener certificates.

nested_items.name: Certificates
nested_items.description: Information about the certificates in the certificate list.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate.

nested_items.name: IsDefault
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the certificate is the default certificate. Do not set this value when specifying a certificate as an input. This value is not included in the output when describing a listener, but is included when describing listener certificates.
